CustomField.description: "1. 'C' if the record was matched to a Customers record; ' 2. ‘L' If the record has ‘INTEGRA TELECOM’ populated in the field ' LNP_GeoLSPname' and not already 'C'; 3. 'N' if CustCode already an ‘L’ and Phones.Phone and GeoBusiness Report.Phone match. 4. 'P' if no match found."
CustomField.label: Customer Code
